job.title: Accounting Assistant I
job.description:
BEDROCK STONE & DESIGN NOW HIRING NON-SMOKING CANDIDATE WITH EXPERIENCE IN ACCOUNTING BUSY, BUSY, BUSY OFFICE AP/AR EXPERIENCE A PLUS CANDIDATE WILL BE ASSISTING BUSY OFFICE AND WILL BE VERSATILE BETWEEN DEPARTMENTS
CANDIDATE MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE WITH ACCOUNTING MIN 3 YRS
CANDIDATE MUST HAVE A KEEN EYE FOR DETAIL
WE ARE LOOKING FOR A STRONG CANDIDATE, THIS INDIVIDUAL MUST BE EXTREMELY ORGANIZED AND ADJUST TO BUSY DAILY WORK OPERATION + + + MUST BE AVAILABLE TO WORK ON SATURDAYS AS WELL<<<<<<<<<<<<< ROTATING SATURDAYS 1/2 DAY
HOURS OF OPERATION MON-SAT 7-5
MICROSOFT OFFICE AND EXCEL EXPERIENCE A PLUS!!
POS CONVERSION A PLUS
PLEASE EMAIL YOUR RESUME TO THE ADDRESS ABOVE OR FAX TO THIS NUMBER: (512) 266-2007

job.title: CDL Class A / Class B Driver
job.description:
Bedrock Stone & Design now hiring Class A or B CDL Truck Drivers
Requirements:
NON- SMOKER
Valid DOT medical card Valid Drivers License Class A or B Experience driving Flatbed with Piggyback attached Experience with Dump Truck Clean driving record
Hours of operation Mon.-Sat. 7:00 am - 5:00 pm Closed on Sundays Overtime paid
We are looking for a hard working individual with good work ethic. Please send resume to email provided or fax to (512) 266-2007. Please do not call office.
